channel.title: Cant. find "trino" from new data source modal UI
channel.description:
Tried to add Trino data source from re:dash(v10.1.0) UI
trino python package and others are set as it should be. However, I can't find trino
redash ver: v10.1.0

item.title: Cant. find "trino" from new data source modal UI
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
The Trino query runner will not be enabled if it encounters an error during its initialisation.

If you remove the try...except block on the query runner you will be able to see the exception in your Redash logs:

github.com

getredash/redash/blob/26ac8ab1cd56f550bef400d2db6e58f87ed2ec45/redash/query_runner/trino.py#L8-L14

      
        
    
            
  1. try:
    2. 
            
  2.     import trino
    3. 
            
  3.     from trino.exceptions import DatabaseError
    4. 
            
  4. 
            
    5. 

  5.     enabled = True
    6. 
            
  6. except ImportError:
    7. 
            
  7.     enabled = False
    8.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant. find "trino" from new data source modal UI
